name: Fashionphile
tag_list: handbags, purses, bags, luggage, louis-vuitton, chanel, hermes, gucci, prada, fendi, bottega-veneta
overview:
Buy and sell your authentic pre-owned authentic luxury handbags at Fashionphile.

Whether or not you live near their showroom on the corner of Rodeo Drive and Wilshire Blvd. in Beverly Hills, California- you have access to their services worldwide on their Fashionphile.com website.

Their inventory is constantly changing… so you’ll always find a wide variety of authentic nearly new, vintage, and limited edition Louis Vuitton, Hermes, Chanel, Gucci, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Marc Jacobs, YSL, Prada, Chloe, Fendi, Christian Dior, Burberry, Tod’s and many more luxury branded pre-owned handbags at a discount off retail prices. Fashionphile has gently used designer handbags, shoulder bags, totes, wallets, luggage, and other luxury accessories.

You’ll find that there are many options available for those looking to sell, buy or consign designer handbags.
